# Support

## Where to get help?

### ğŸ’¬ Community Discord
Join our [Discord Server](https://discord.gg/ecuabyte) for real-time discussion, "How do I..." questions, and showing off what you built.

### ğŸ› Bug Reports
If you found a technical fault, please search existing [Issues](https://github.com/EcuaByte-lat/Cortex/issues). If not found, open a new one using the **Bug Report** template.

### ğŸ’¡ Feature Requests
Have an idea? Use the **Feature Request** template to pitch it to the community.

### ğŸ”’ Security
For security vulnerabilities, please email **security@ecuabyte.com** directly. See [SECURITY.md](SECURITY.md).

## Commercial Support
For enterprise SLAs, on-premise deployment, or dedicated support, please verify our [Enterprise Plans](https://cortex.ecuabyte.lat/enterprise).
